page.title: 12A bank in Brackley
page.content: We visted a bank in Brackley and talked to the manager. He starts work at 9.00a.m. and stays until all the work is done. Sometimes he helps count the money at the end of the day. He is responsible for the running of the branch and his staff (there are 17 but they do not all work at the same time). He wanted to work in a bank as he liked doing maths but he finds that the computer does most of the work. The bank offers many services such as mortgages, traveller's cheques, cheque and savings accounts and overdrafts. They also keep valuables in their safe for customers. It is a room with a heavy door and shelves. Inside this is {another} room with another heavy door and in there is a box safe with the bank's money.People always go into the safe in twos so that everyone has a witness.
